price: 82. Y quienes crean y actúen con rectitud, esos serán los habitantes del Paraíso y allí permanecerán eternamente.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
